sources.title: All About Dogs (1942)
sources.description: A travelogue/documentary parody,where we look at different breeds at a dog show, and see that the humans resemble the dogs, and the canines do all the predictable gags. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/all-about-dogs-1942/

metadata.Plot: In this travelogue parody, humans at a dog show resemble their canine counterparts, while the dogs steal the spotlight with their predictable gags. A comical exploration of the connection between humans and dogs.
metadata.Writer: John Foster, Isadore Klein, Donald McKee
